title: Bayer agrees to $7.25 billion proposed settlement over thousands of Roundup cancer lawsuits
description: Bayer has agreed to $7.25 billion proposed settlement over thousands of lawsuits alleging the company failed to warn people that its popular weedkiller Roundup could cause cancer.
content: Bayer has agreed to $7.25 billion proposed settlement over thousands of lawsuits alleging the company failed to warn people that its popular weedkiller Roundup could cause cancer.
